channel.title: OpenNetAdmin on Ajdin's blog
channel.description: Recent content in OpenNetAdmin on Ajdin's blog

item.title: HackTheBox Openadmin Write Up
item.description: Reconnaissance Let’s see what have we got here with nmap. nmap -sC -sV -O -oA nmap/initial 10.10.10.171 -sC: run default script scan -sV: probe open ports to determine service/version info -O: OS detection -oA: output OS detection, version detection, script scanning, and tracerouteÂ Nmap returns the results quick as it by default scans only for most popular 1000 ports, so lets scan all the ports while we investigate the initial nmap scan.
